title: Whole Foods CEO John Mackey to Retire in 2022
sub_head: Texan helped popularize organic food when he co-founded the grocer in 1980
body:
Whole Foods Market Chief Executive John Mackey will retire next year as head of the company he co-founded more than four decades ago in Austin, Texas.
Chief Operating Officer Jason Buechel will become the grocer’s next CEO when Mr. Mackey steps down on Sept. 1, 2022, the company said. Whole Foods Market has more than 500 retail and non-retail locations in the U.S., Canada and UK.
